nodes.text: Busteromuchmacho and the Arc to Infinity

Busteromuchmacho and the Arc to Infinity was a volume of the Squib Jedi series of children's holobooks. In the story, the Squib Jedi Busteromuchmacho went on a quest for the origin of the Force itself. The many dangers he faced included the crossing of a seemingly endless bridge between the stars, as well as confrontations with a witch of Dathomir, a Force demon, and a trans-dimensional gamester
of life-and-death. When Halagad Ventor was a child, his father often read it to him as a bedtime story.
